title: Definitions
context: [ยง353D-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Center&rdquo; means an offender family service center. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means that department of the State that has jurisdiction over the administration of the correctional facilities. &ldquo;Program&rdquo; means the offender family service center program. [L 1987, c 251, pt of ยง1]
